other_tests.findings: The liver is normal in echotexture without focal abnormalities. There is no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary ductal dilatation. The common duct measures 4 mm. The main portal vein demonstrates normal hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites. The gallbladder is normal, without evidence of stones. There is no pericholecystic fluid, wall thickening, or other evidence of acute cholecystitis. The pancreatic head and body are unremarkable.
